name: Dark Souls II: Collector's Edition
summary:
Developed by From Software, Dark Souls II is the highly anticipated sequel to the punishing 2011 breakout hit Dark Souls. The unique old-school action RPG experience captivated the imaginations of gamers worldwide with incredible challenges and intense emotional rewards. Dark Souls II brings the franchise's renowned difficulty and gripping gameplay innovations to both single and multiplayer experiences.

The Collector's Edition includes:
Black Armour Edition Metal Case
Standard Game
Game Soundtrack
Authentic Cloth Game Map
Collectible Art Book
12"/30cm Warrior Knight Figurine
